message: This offer divides the money equally, considering the diminishing value due to inflation.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more considering the initial offer was too low.
I've adjusted my offer based on the previous round's inflation. This proposal aims for a balanced division while accounting for the decreasing value of money.
I'm willing to meet in the middle and aim for a 50/50 split, considering the inflation has reduced the value of the money.
